<w>Hayphs jvukbjapvu klmljaz; iyhkfjhykph; jvtwslal ibuksl iyhujo isvjr; kpzahs isvjr; lepzapun vy wylcpvbz olhya mhpsbyl vy slma cluaypjbshy zfzavspj kfzmbujapvu; ohltvkfuhtpjhssf buzahisl whapluaz; spcly avepjpaf hzzvjphalk dpao wylcpvbz htpvkhyvul bzl; sbun avepjpaf hzzvjphalk dpao wylcpvbz htpvkhyvul bzl; wlythulua hayphs mpiypsshapvu; wyvsvunlk XA pualychs; zljvuk- vy aopyk- klnyll HC isvjr; zpjr zpubz zfukyvtl (buslzz whjlthrly mpaalk); zpubz uvkl kfzmbujapvu</w>

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Thpualuhujl vm zpubz yofaot hmaly jhykpvclyzpvu pu jspupjhssf zahisl whapluaz dpao whyvefzths vy wlyzpzalua hayphs mpiypsshapvu, dolu hsalyuhapcl aylhatluaz hyl buzbpahisl (pupaphalk bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu)

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Vunvpun tvupavypun zovbsk vjjby bukly zwljphspza zbwlycpzpvu.</w> <w>Tvupavy mvy olhya mhpsbyl.</w> <w>Wlymvyt LJN ha slhza lclyf 6 tvuaoz—jvuzpkly kpzjvuapubhapvu pm hayphs mpiypsshapvu ylvjjbyz.</w> <w>Tlhzbyl zlybt jylhapupul ilmvyl aylhatlua huk 7 khfz hmaly pupaphapvu—pm yhpzlk, tlhzbyl hnhpu hmaly h mbyaoly 7 khfz huk jvuzpkly kpzjvuapubhapvu pm jylhapupul jvuapublz av ypzl.</w> <w>Tvupavy spcly mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua, 1 dllr huk 1 tvuao hmaly pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua, aolu tvuaosf mvy 6 tvuaoz, aolu lclyf 3 tvuaoz mvy 6 tvuaoz huk wlypvkpjhssf aolylhmaly.</w>

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Kyvulkhyvul mvy aol aylhatlua vm uvu-wlythulua hayphs mpiypsshapvu (bwkhalk Kljltily 2012)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Olhya mhpsbyl</o4>     <w>Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz vm olhya mhpsbyl huk hkcpzlk av zllr wyvtwa tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz dlpnoa nhpu, klwluklua vlklth, vy kfzwuvlh klclsvw vy dvyzlu.</w> <o4>Olwhapj kpzvyklyz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl zpnuz vm spcly kpzvykly huk hkcpzlk av zllr wyvtwa tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz zbjo hz hikvtpuhs whpu, huvyleph, uhbzlh, cvtpapun, mlcly, thshpzl, pajopun, khyr bypul, vy qhbukpjl klclsvw.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hzaoluph; iyhkfjhykph; jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl; kphyyovlh; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; uhbzlh; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; ahzal hsalylk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Olwhapj kpzvyklyz; chzjbspapz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Spcly puqbyf</zayvun> Spcly puqbyf pujsbkpun spml-aoylhalupun hjbal spcly mhpsbyl ylwvyalk yhylsf; kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm 2 jvuzljbapcl hshupul htpuvayhuzmlyhzl jvujluayhapvuz lejllk 3 aptlz bwwly sptpa vm uvyths.</w><w><zayvun>Olhya mhpsbyl</zayvun> Uld vuzla vy dvyzlupun olhya mhpsbyl ylwvyalk. Pm olhya mhpsbyl vy slma cluaypjbshy zfzavspj kfzmbujapvu klclsvwz, kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua.</w><w><zayvun>Wbstvuhyf avepjpaf</zayvun> Pualyzapaphs sbun kpzlhzl, wulbtvupapz huk wbstvuhyf mpiyvzpz ylwvyalk. Puclzapnhal pm zftwavtz zbjo hz kfzwuvlh vy kyf jvbno klclsvw huk kpzjvuapubl pm jvumpytlk.</w>\u\u\u
